madridAward.title: YIGO WINS GOLD AT THE ARCHITECTURE MADRID AWARDS 2025
madridAward.excerpt: YIGO Group has earned global recognition at the Architecture Madrid Awards 2025, winning Gold in Residential Architecture for its Dubai flagship project, CBD26.

familyFriendly.title: THE BEST FAMILY-FRIENDLY COMMUNITIES IN DUBAI (2025 GUIDE)
familyFriendly.excerpt: Dubai is home to some of the world's most thoughtfully planned residential communities.

newEra.title: YIGO LAUNCHES A NEW ERA OF LIVING IN DUBAI'S INTERNATIONAL CITY
newEra.excerpt: YIGO Group has officially launched its first Middle Eastern development, located at Plot CBD26 in Dubai's International City.

expansion.title: YIGO GROUP EXPANDS INTO DUBAI'S DYNAMIC REAL ESTATE MARKET
expansion.excerpt: With over 23 years of experience in Asia and Europe, YIGO Group marks its strategic expansion into Dubai's real estate market.

investing.title: INVESTING IN DUBAI PROPERTY – THE PROS AND CONS YOU SHOULD KNOW
investing.excerpt: Dubai continues to rank among the most attractive real estate markets worldwide.
